sentences.sentence: But with the conquering of the Romans in the west Mediterranean area and Britain, Druidism gradually disappeared from the scene.
sentences.translation: 但是随着罗马人对西地中海地区及不列颠的征服，督伊德教逐渐销声匿迹。

sentences.sentence: It seems to some fans the principles of druidism would be antithetical to the majority of high elves, and it didn't appear there was any indication of any renegade sect of druids.
sentences.translation: 似乎德鲁伊信徒在高等精灵社会中是和主流对立的，并且没有迹象表明有被判信仰的德鲁伊出现。
